name: Billy's West Quest
description:
You are a wanderer cowboy, and a frog.

You use your tongue to defeat your foes and to free your mates.
Some mysterious forces offer you great powers but at what cost?

🤔 How To Play

In Browser (Full screen recommended for mouse capture)

WASD or Arrows to Move
Mouse to Aim
Left Click to Attack

Gamepad supported for PC*

Direction Pad, Left Analog Stick to Move
Right Analog Stick to Aim
Right Trigger to Attack

Gamepad support has only been tested with an XBox360 controller on Windows

👨‍🎨 Credits

Made by Lenny Sirivong in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 43 (Compo) and Mini Jam 16.

Updates

1.0.1 12-03-2018 Bug Fixes:

  • Fix game over scene so you can play again if you chose Gun
  • Fix sacrifice amount was taking off double health

👇 Get the executable for Windows now for better graphics and gamepad support! 👇
